course.course_group: East Asian Film and Media Studies
course.title: The Uses and Meaning of the New Arts of Presentation
course.description: Exploration of the new horizons of communication created by current media technology and their implications for the future of teaching and scholarship. The seminar will combine theoretical readings and reflection with practical, hands-on experiments using podcasts, media-intensive lectures, and iMovies for conveying academic research.
